channel.title: About on Sarah Salter

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! My name is Sarah Salter :). I am currently a Biostatistics graduate student at Johns Hopkins School of Public Health. I received my undergraduate training in Mathematical Science and Computer Science, and my graduate training in Biostatistics and Data Science. The past few years I have had the pleasure of working as a data scientist, medical research assistant and a teaching assistant during my time at Johns Hopkins University.
